Drop it into a savings account? Should only take 70 years or so to get to $200 at today's rates. Alternately I would consider buying something that would make me more productive and that I could use for a long time.

The idea came about when I was doing some work for a client and his video guy gave him a link to download his final product, the download page had a ton of ads and looked completely unprofessional.

I've decided to take the "buy 10 domains" idea and  launch a bunch of MVPs and see if any stick.  The first is http://boxedfiles.com . This site allows you to upload files then send someone an access key.

If you found $100 on the ground today, you should turn it into the police station. It's not yours. Your reward will be greater knowing that you did what's right.
